titles.title: To prohibit the inclusion of earmarks in the Intelligence Authorization Act for Fiscal Year 2010.
To prohibit the inclusion of earmarks in the Intelligence Authorization Act for Fiscal Year 2010.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Intelligence (Permanent Select).

bill.summary: Prohibits the inclusion of earmarks in the enactment of a bill authorizing intelligence activities for FY2010. (Thus prohibits earmarks in the Intelligence Authorization Act for Fiscal Year 2010.)
